summary: Completed comprehensive testing of B2B Travel Portal. Backend APIs working perfectly with proper RBAC enforcement. Frontend functional with minor UI component issues.

ui_bugs.issue: HTML hydration errors with table structure - div elements incorrectly nested in table elements
ui_bugs.selector: Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell components

ui_bugs.issue: Form field selectors are not specific enough, causing timeout issues when filling form

integration_issues.issue: Sub-agency login fails to redirect to dashboard (timeout), though backend API works correctly

passed_tests: Backend API authentication and authorization (17/17 tests passed)
RBAC enforcement - admin columns (14-18) hidden from sub-agencies at API level
Language toggle between RU and EN
Navigation to Sub-Agencies and Settings pages
Statistics API with role-based data filtering
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix HTML table structure issues causing hydration errors. Investigate sub-agency login UI flow - backend works but frontend redirect fails. Improve form field selectors in add reservation dialog for better reliability.
